title: Retolar en Valencià
subtitle: Promoting the use of the Valencian language in businesses
excerpt: Adaptable signage/labeling pack to promote the Valencian language in businesses.

description.text: To promote the use of the Valencian language, the Plataforma de Normalització Lingüística (Platform for Linguistic Normalization) every year releases an adaptable signage/labeling pack in valencian, aimed to all kind of businesses and spaces. This labeling is then distributed to valencian businesses. This was my proposal for the 2009 edition.
